about_the_game:
Create your own ski realm in Skingdom, a ski resort construction and management game! Arrange your resort, draw your slopes and build your lifts, hotels and shops. Take care of your budget, hire staff and invest in upgrades for your ski resort to reach the top of the mountain!

Build different lift types : ski lifts, chair lifts, gondola lifts and cable car lifts

Each lift type has its own characteristics. Speed, seats or maximum altitude, invest in the best lifts to outcome the mountain challenges.

Draw slopes for your guests, from easy green slopes in the forest for beginners to the hard slopes with bumps on the edge of the mountains for the most experienced skiers.

Build your resort by investing in housing to welcome your vacationers and shops to satisfy all their needs. But the mountain is not only skiing, movies, pools and other activities will allow your guests to relax after a long day of sports.

Hire qualified staff to manage your station

From ski patrollers to rescue skiers in danger to people to operate the lifts, not forgetting mechanics or snow groomers that take care of your slopes.

Make your ski resort progress by unlocking skills split in three talent trees : ecology, company and development. Each category will offer unique improvements : staff training, lifts improvement, snow canons, special slopes or environmental protection.

Invest in communication to make your resort stand up. Select your target audience, families or wealthy skiers for example, and make sure to satisfy your guests with adapted residencies for families and fancy cottages for the most fortunate public. Satisfaction of your visitors is the key to make your ski resort an unmissable of winter sports.

Choose between multiple game modes: career, scenario or realm

In career mode you are in charge of an empty mountain. Build the perfect resort starting from scratch. Take care of your budget and invest in research to unlock new lifts, new housing buildings and activities for your guests.

The scenario mode will put your management skills to the test by offering special challenges. Put back an old resort on track by dealing with the lack of snow or transform a family resort to the number one destination of wealthy skiers.

Finally, in realm mode it’s a complete mountain range that you will have to expand. Buy empty mountains and sell profitable ski resorts to develop your own winter sports realm.

Create your dream ski resort and contemplate the beauty of the mountain

From the calmness of snow falls to the euphoria of sunny days, appreciate each unique ambiance that mountain has to offer.

Enjoy unique landscapes on the sound of the original soundtrack created by the lo-fi composer: WYS.
